title: PBE
body: I was applying for a pbe account and I never got a response it was like the 3rd time I applied and I wanted to know if i met the requirements and if not why thank you

replies.body: A response will only be sent after being accepted to the PBE.  I know it may feel like it's taking a while, but there's no guarantee or way to expedite admission to the PBE.  As long as you have a positive standing on your account, you'll have a chance of getting in.  We also have a [PBE FAQ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/pbe-faq) that provides more information on getting accepted.  Best of luck in getting!
ok how do i know i have a positive standing i dont recall doing anything i can be reported 4
